mention.text: Powell , who plans to resume his active duty military career when Reagan 's term ends Jan. 20
a speech prepared for delivery to the National Press Club
Soviet officials in Moscow on Thursday
Gorbachev , who recently took on the additional title of president of the Soviet Union with the retirement of Andrei Gromyko
Afghanistan , where the Soviets have begun pulling out forces that have occupied the Southwest Asian nation since 1979
the changing political climate in the Soviet Union
an acknowledgment of the failure of the Soviet system to provide for its people
the Soviet system to provide for its people
restive nationalities in the Soviet Union and around the Soviet empire
remaining political prisoners in the Soviet Union _ as West German Chancellor Helmut Kohl had indicated following talks with Kremlin officials
an economic system that is not up to the demands of the 1990s and the 21st century
